paper_metadata.title: Monitoring the Patient with Retinal Angiopathy Associated with Hereditary Transthyretin Amyloidosis: Current Perspectives
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: retinal angiopathy associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The prevalence of retinal angiopathy in ATTRv patients is lower than other ocular manifestations of the disease but it increases with time.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with retinal angiopathy.

variants.additional_notes: The study indicates that the Val30Met mutation is the most frequent mutation worldwide.
key_quotes: The prevalence of retinal angiopathy in ATTRv patients is lower than other ocular manifestations of the disease but it increases with time.

functional_data.summary: The Tyr38Cys mutation is associated with retinal angiopathy.

variants.additional_notes: This mutation has been reported in a single case with retinal angiopathy.
